name: figma-font-toolkit
description: A minimal Figma plugin for font management and replacement

scripts.build: npm run build:plugin && npm run build:ui && npm run copy:assets
scripts.copy:assets: cp src/ui/index.html dist/ui.html && cp dist/ui/index.js dist/index.js && cp -r src/ui/styles dist/styles
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run watch

author: Font Toolkit Team
